author: Ben Weiss
title: Bitcoin and crypto investors hit with flood of IRS letters, say tax experts
description: Crypto tax platform CoinLedger cites a ninefold increase in users asking about IRS letters.
content: Crypto investors are poised for record returns on Bitcoin and other digital assetsand so, too, is the taxman. The Internal Revenue Service has sent U.S. crypto investors a flood of warning letters ab… [+2959 chars]
